name: Mr. Plumber Man
description:
Mr. Georges Manuel is your average plumber leading a normal life in the big city, but NOW he needs YOUR help! Construct pipelines, solve problems and fix leakages with the aim of becoming the ultimate plumber!


Mr. Plumber Man is a clone of the classic PC game Pipe Mania (or Pipe Dream), made for college in a few days; some of the original features are absent but it should be all functional. Also, it has kind of a narrative.

  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON does everything.
  • F1 and F2 can be used to change window size when in-game.
  • If you happen to get an S and an E slot blocking each other, hit the REFRESH button.

If you happen to like this dumb thing, check out my other, bigger game. Any donations will help the development of that project <3
